de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISAttachment


  • public interface ISAttachment
    see ICAttachment
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getAttachmentAPI().load(con, id);

      • check

        Boolean check(Connection con,
            int id)
              throws SQLException
        Checks whether the attachment is external and the content was loaded. Additionally, the conditions must be complied: buffer.length == 3 && buffer[0] == 0 && buffer[1] == 1 && buffer[2] == 2
